content.question: When x=8, the rate at which <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="the cube root of x"> <semantics> <mrow> <mroot> <mi>x</mi> <mn>3</mn> </mroot> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaGcbaWdaeaapeGaamiEaaWcpaqaa8qacaaIZaaaaaaa@3829@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> is increasing is <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" aria-label="1 divide by k"> <semantics> <mrow> <mfrac> <mn>1</mn> <mi>k</mi> </mfrac> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaaeaaaaaaaaa8 qadaWcaaWdaeaapeGaaGymaaWdaeaapeGaam4Aaaaaaaa@380F@ </annotation> </semantics> </math> times the rate at which x is increasing. What is the value of k ?
